summary: A face preset from my Nord character, Tyrna.
descriptionHtml:
Tyrna is also available as a follower! [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74269/?]Tyrna - Nord Follower on Nexus[/url] - [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=142983438]Steam Workshop[/url]

[u][i][b][color=#f1c232][size=3]HOW TO USE THIS PRESET[/size][/color][/b][/i][/u]

1. Open the console by pressing º
2. Type "setrace nord". Your character will now become a Nord, this will not mess up with your attributes or skills.
3. Type "showracemenu" select Nord race, Default Setting. You'll find her in the preset located at the first position of the slider.

[b]I recommend to start a new game, changing your character's face in a current game can cause weird glitches (dirty face).[/b]

If you want her to look like the screenshots, you can use these mods:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4307]AOF Believable Hair by AnOldFriend[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563]Coverwomen - Look 3 by mrLenski[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3589]Natural Eyes by nevenbridge[/url]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=122959536]This preset is also available on Steam Workshop[/url]


[b][i][u][color=#f1c232][size=3]INSTALLATION[/size][/color][/u][/i][/b]

Place "[b]TyrnaPreset.esp[/b]" in your Skyrim/Data Folder

Enable it by using NMM or Skyrim Launcher/Data Files

[b][i][u][color=#f1c232][size=3]UNINSTALL[/size][/color][/u][/i][/b]

Uninstall using the Skyrim Launcher: 

Search for the file in the Data Section tab of Skyrim Launcher, and unselect "[b]TyrnaPreset.esp[/b]"

Go to Skyrim\Data and delete "[b]TyrnaPreset.esp[/b]"
author: Wartinald
